alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:43PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marinette, Menominee and central Oconto Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Smokey Falls, or 15 miles north of Shawano, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marinette, Menominee, Oconto, Gillett, Pound, Big Smokey Falls, Legend Lake, Keshena, South Branch and Neopit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
